definitions.text: good discernment (either visually or as if visually)
examples: she has an eye for fresh talent
he tried to catch her eye

definitions.text: an area that is approximately central within some larger region
examples: it is in the center of town
they ran forward into the heart of the struggle
they were in the eye of the storm

definitions.text: a small hole or loop (as in a needle)
examples: the thread wouldn't go through the eye
